description.value:
The Great Old One lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHideousLau]{Tasha's Hideous Laughter}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.rI4Xri8O6zboJjTp]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSending000]{Sending}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCompulsion]{Compulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}
